# GRAPHICS::SET_CHECKPOINT_CYLINDER_HEIGHT

## Summary
Sets the min and max height  of any cylinder in a checkpoint and the distance at which the height starts to decrease from the max to the min scale

## Parameters
* **CHECKPOINT_INDEX** uniqueCheckpointIndex
* **FLOAT** cylinderHeightMin
* **FLOAT** cylinderHeightMax
* **FLOAT** cylinderHeightDist

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets the cylinder height of the checkpoint.

Parameters:
* nearHeight - The height of the checkpoint when inside of the radius.
* farHeight - The height of the checkpoint when outside of the radius.
* radius - The radius of the checkpoint.
